Chris,

In the spirits of the Money example, here are things may get you started. 
This implementation tests an atg component from a browser.

AnyAtgComponent is the atg object to be tested
AtgComponentMoneyTest is the junit test class for AnyAtgComponent class
AtgComponentTestRunHandler is the atg component's jhtml handler class
junittestatgcomponent.jhtml provides an interface to excute the test from a 
browser



Good luck.
Thach

At 04:57 PM 9/12/2001 +0000, you wrote:
>Could anyone provide information on using JUnit to test ATG Dynamo?
>It seems that Cactus might be a good solution, but I was hoping
>someone might have experience in integrating them before.  Any help
>would be greatly appreciated.
>
>Thanks,
>Chris
